Properties.Name: Titel
Properties.Description: Please explain quickly what the problem is.

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: Please explain it very detailed, so I can easily reproduce this bug.

Properties.Name: Error Messages
Properties.Description:
Have you got an error message?
If yes, copy the text of the message and past it here.

Properties.Name: Contact
Properties.Description:
It would be good to know how you can be contacted.
Write down your Discord#0000 or Skype Name or E-Mail Address.
